Class ZipExtractor

java.lang.Object
com.example.ZipExtractor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExplorerCollection
public class ZipExtractor extends Object implements ExplorerCollection
The ZipExtractor class handles the extraction of ZIP files, including nested zip files, and stores the directories of student submissions.

This class implements the ExplorerCollection interface and provides functionality to extract ZIP files and manage the extracted directories.

  • Method Details

    • getStudentDirectories

      public static List<String> getStudentDirectories()
      Gets the list of directories where student submissions have been extracted.
      Returns:
      the list of student directories.

    • extractSubmissionZip

      public static void extractSubmissionZip(String zipFilePath, String destinationDir) throws IOException
      Extracts all zipped folders inside the specified submission.zip file and places them directly in the given destination directory.

      If a nested zip file is found, it is extracted, unzipped, and its contents are stored in a new folder. The original nested zip file is deleted after extraction.

      Parameters:
      zipFilePath - The path to the main submission.zip file to extract.
      destinationDir - The directory to place extracted contents.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during file extraction.

    • unzipFile

      public static void unzipFile(String zipFilePath, String destinationDir) throws IOException
      Unzips a given ZIP file into the specified directory.

      The method will extract all files and directories from the zip file into the target directory.

      Parameters:
      zipFilePath - The path to the zip file to unzip.
      destinationDir - The directory to extract the zip file contents into.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during extraction.

    • createParentDirs

      public static void createParentDirs(File file)
      Creates any missing parent directories for a given file.

      This ensures that the file’s parent directories exist before creating the file.

      Parameters:
      file - The file for which to create missing parent directories.

    • createDirectoryIterator

      public DirectoryIterator createDirectoryIterator()
      Creates and returns a DirectoryIterator that iterates over the list of student directories.
      Specified by:
      createDirectoryIterator in interface ExplorerCollection
      Returns:
      A DirectoryIterator for the list of student directories.
